description: Extension of cat-slide roof and erection of dormer extension to west elevation
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, any windows or rooflights at frist floor level or above in the western elevation shall be constructed so that no part of the framework less than 1.7m above finished floor level shall be openable. Any part below that level shall be fitted with and permanently retained in obscure glazing to a minimum of level 3 on the standard scale. Any film used to achieve the requisite obscurity level shall be non-perishable, tamper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to result in obscurity to level 3.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) (or any Order revoking and reenacting that Order with or without modification), no windows shall be inserted nor any other openings formed (other than those expressly authorised by this permission) at first floor level or above in the in the western elevation of the dwelling unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details for Condition 16 (Ecology Enhancement) of appeal decision APP/Z5630/W/20/3260562 for planning permission 20/01216/FUL has been assessed by relevant Officers and is hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the approved details.

The assessment of this application has been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings. If you carry out development based on incorrect plans you may be liable to the Council taking enforcement action against you.

Please submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.The submitted location plan shows the red outline only in the corner of the site, please show the complete  red outline in the proposed site.

Please confirm the description ''Demolition of existing rear conservatory, erection of single storey rear extension. Raising the ridge at the rear part of the roof with rear juliet balcony and installation of 6 nos side roof lights to facilitate loft conversion. Internal and external alteration.''
